United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 09-2231

                       SHELDON G. ADELSON,

                      Plaintiff, Appellee,

                               v.

                         MOSHE HANANEL,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on July 13, 2011 is amended
as follows:

     On page 9, line 3, change "2006" to "1996"
